metadata.Title: CVE-2015-5569 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player before 18.0.0.252 and 19.x before 19.0.0.207 on Windowsand OS X and before 11.2.202.535 on Linux, Adobe AIR before 19.0.0.213,Adobe AIR SDK before 19.0.0.213, and Adobe AIR SDK & Compiler before19.0.0.213 improperly implement the Flash broker API, which has unspecifiedimpact and attack vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.535ubuntu0.14.04.1').
